comment_toHelpYouOut: Section is the array of brands having logo link, sub heading and their items (items are the articles featured in different websites). Items array has image (i.e., article's website logo), link (i.e., article link to that site), and content (i.e., short description displays in popover). You need to copy entire brands array's first element if you need to add new brand and its details.

items.content: Steven Alan And Eponym Open New Steven Alan Optical Store In Nolita.

When looking at disruption in the eyewear space, most people talk about Warby Parker. That is because Warby Parker is cutting out the middleman and selling eyewear directly to consumers. However, there is a new disruptor in town and its name is Eponym.
